summary: Han Jung Soo is the typical good guy, with friends and good at school. But due to some misunderstanding others mistake him with the legendary Seven Cutter and his life becomes really hard.
cast: Jae-mo Ahn|Myeong-hun Cheon|Hyeon-yeong|Jun-ha Jeong|Eul-dong Kim|Jeong Lee|Hyo-jun Park|Seul-gi Park|Eun-hye Yun
title: Kariseuma talchulgi
